snippet: The deaths, at Electric Zoo on Randalls Island, were consistent with use of the drug Ecstasy, according to the mayor’s office, which recommended the event be called off.
abstract: Electric Zoo, multi-day electronic music festival that draws tens of thousands of people to Randalls Island over Labor Day weekend, is canceled on its last day after city officials say two concertgoers had died and at least four others had fallen critically ill; deaths appear to be consistent with use of drug MDMA, also known as Ecstasy or molly.

byline.original: By VIVIAN YEE and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

lead_paragraph: The deaths, at Electric Zoo on Randalls Island, were consistent with use of the drug Ecstasy, according to the mayor’s office, which recommended the event be called off.

headline.main: Weekend Revelry Cut Short After 2 Die at Electronic Music Festival
headline.print_headline: Weekend Revelry Abruptly Ends After 2 Die at Electronic Music Festival
